query:
ALTER TABLE bonusCalculations 
ADD COLUMN baseSalaryCents INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN appliedMultiplierPercent INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN performanceScore INT DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN goalCompletionRate INT DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN adjustmentReason TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN approvedBy INT DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN approvedAt DATETIME DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN paidAt DATETIME DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN calculatedAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN referenceMonth VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL DEFAULT '2025-01'
